body:
I just got my first job and I felt pretty hyped so I made this.

1. When was your first job?
2. How old where you when you got it?
3. What type of job was it? (groceries, convenience store)

Have fun!

replies.body:
1. When was your first job?
2 Years ago.
2. How old were you when you got it?
15
3. What type of job was it? 
I was a dishy at a baking factory.  I don't work there anymore.

I can no longer eat caramel slice because it's all I smelt for dozens and dozens of hours...

I'm 14 but haven't gotten my first job yet. My Dad is offering me a nice sum of money every time I help him at work.

In the future I'd like to work for the ESA, or European Space Agency.

replies.body:
1. When was your first job?: Last year. Still working
2. How old where you when you got it?: 13
3. What type of job was it? (groceries, conv: enience store):  I work at school in the lunch line to serve lunch to students. I don't get payed but I get free food. I get to pick anything I like from the cafeteria. There is a lot of good food, candy, snack, drinks, etc.
